A-Quiet-Day.Description: The woods are quiet right now. A dirt path shaded by the trees goes to the north and south. There's some mushrooms growing by the side of the path. A few crows are resting in the trees, occasaionally cawing.

A-Rustling-Over-Yonder.Description: A dirt path shaded by the trees runs to the north and south. In a nearby bush you hear something rustling.

A-Traveling-Salesman.Description: Leaves gently fall on the dirt path which runs to the north and south. A traveling salesman is passing by in his brilliant blue cart, led by two sturdy oxen.
